title: Naperville, IL Chiropractor | Chiropractor in Naperville, IL | Aurora, IL Functional Medicine
description: Naperville, IL Chiropractor, Dr. Kent Christianson provides Chiropractic Care, Functional Medicine, Acupuncture, Nutrition and treatments for Back Pain, Neck Pain, Autoimmune, Fatigue to the following locations: Naperville, Aurora, Wheaton, Plainfield, IL.
cleaned_text: Dr. Kent Christianson is dedicated to helping you achieve your wellness objectives. He combines skill and expertise that span the entire wellness spectrum, including Chiropractic, Chinese Medicine, Enzyme therapies, yoga and proven movement therapies (for rehab and performance enhancement). He is committed to bringing you better health and a better way of life by teaching and practicing the true principles of chiropractic wellness care. Schedule today to begin healing your body, mind and spirit.
